content: textures shawl take one textures is a rectangular shawl approximately 60 x 18 finished size and amount of yarn needed depend on gauge gauge is not vital to the finished product dk weight yarn approximately 740 yards size 5 needles shalimar yarns american beauty breathless 3 skeins were used for this shawl cast on 82 stitches i use german twisted cast on rs row are odd numbered row lower border knit 12 row chevron r1 k5 *k3 p5 k3 p1 repeat from * to last 5 sts k5 r2 k5 *k1 p3 k5 p3 repeat from * to last 5 sts k5 r3 k5 p1 *k3 p3 repeat from * to last 10 sts k3 p2 k5 r4 k5 k2 p3 * k3 p3 last 6 sts p1 k5 r18 k5 *k3 p3 k1 p3 k2 repeat from * to last 5 sts k5 r11 k5 *k2 p3 k1 p3 k3 repeat from * to last 5 sts k5 r19 k5 *p3 k5 p3 k1 repeat from * to last 5 sts k5 r12 k5 *p3 k3 p1 k3 p2
